eewa ekwi harithagara wayu (hagawa) palanaya saha adu kirime pa්rathama jathyanthara giwisuma sakas kara ganina. 2005 pebarawari 16 da giwisuma ka්riyathmaka wiya. 2011 desambar 11 kanadawa nila washayen kyoto kathikawen iwath weyi. 2013 juni 23 da afganisthanaya giwisuma pili ganimath samagama kyoto sammuthiyata sambandhawana 192 wani samajikaya bawata pathweyi. 2015 di parisiye di eksath jathinge deshaguna wiparyasa pilibanda padakawyuha sammelanaye siyalu samajikayo paris sammuthiyata athsan thabathi.

sunil daya alwisghathanayata lakwu hambanthota bandagiriya madhyama beheth shalawa bara waidya niladharini waliwitiye don lakshmi indunil (33) menawiyage pawule ayata sudusu wandiyak labadimata piyawara ganna lesa mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma saukhya lekam waidya athula kahandaliyanage mahathata upades di atharajaye waidya niladharinge sangamaye niyojitha pirisak ha janadhipathithuma athara araliyagaha mandirayedi sikurada pawathi sakachchawakadi rajaye waidya niladharinge sangamaya ghathanayata lakwu waidyawariya sambandhayen karunu rasak janadhipathithuma wetha idiripath kara sitiyaha.ayage maranayata wagakiwayuthu sakakara hamuda sebalage marana tharjana kalaka sita pawathiddith gam pa්radeshayata maruwimak ho nolaba janadhipathithumagema gam pa්radeshayata ayath hambanthota dushkara palathaka aya sewaya kele ema pa්radeshayema janathawage pa්rasadaya labaganimin bawada pashchath simawasika sewa mattamaka sitiyadi ha aya sewaya kala sthanaye nila niwasayedi ghathanayata lakwima pilibandawa karunu salaka bala ayata wandi mudal labadima parikshana katayuthu nisi paridi sidu kirima demapiyanta yamkisi hawharanayak labadima siduwiya yuthu bawada rajaye waidya niladharinge sangamaya mehidi karunu penwa dun bawa upa lekam waidya upul gunasekara mahatha kiyawaidya niladharin penwa dun karunu salakillata gath janadhipathithuma saukhya lekamwaraya wetha upades laba dunne me pilibandawa kala haki siyalu katayuthu pilibandawa soya bala sudusu wandiyak ha awashya katayuthu yodana lesayame ghathana siddhiyata adala parikshana katayuthu widhimathwa pawathwimata da polispathiwarayata da janadhipathithuma upades dunneyamewani siduwimak gana siya balawath kanagatuwa da pala kara siti janadhipathithuma dushkara palathwala sewayata me siddhiya pamanak padaka karanoganna lesath idiriyata mewani siddhin athiwimata ida nothaba katayuthu karana bawada waidyawarunta aarakshawa pilibandawa biyak nowiya yuthu bawada penwa di athame awasthawata aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha da sahabhagi wiyame athara me waidyawariyage awamangul katayuthu eeye kaluthara dodangoda pawule susana bhumiyedi athiwishala pirisakage sahabhagithwayen
